Text: Tupo perenesli staruju ideju v 3d. Na hrena takoi ogorod goroditi, kada nichto ne mogut roditi. Bablososy herovy!!!!

Ne pashet.Setup zavalivaetsea posle podgotovki k installiacii.
Skachaiu angliiskuiu versiu.

Kto-nibud' znaet, kak na etu versiu stavit' patchi? Pishut, shto igra ne ustanovlena.

Anybody knows how to apply patches to this version? Whenever I try to do this, program says that the game isn't installed.
when i try burning this on a disk does if have to be dual layer or no
@richieldsm well since the file size isn't even 1 GB, it'll be a waste even on a regular DvD, just mount it with Alcohol 120%
i'm trying to patch this with the latest patch (1.3) but it says it cant find the game folder on the hard drive, do i have to move the folder somewhere and rename it?
